title: 3.5mm headphone jack adapter eco
content:
Hi,
since I bought my pixel 2XL and everytime I try to connect the 3.5mm adapter to my headphones for a call(either over the internet or celleular calls), the callers always hear their voice's eco and it has been a huge burden for me because even when using different heaphones the problem still presists.

any help with this matter would be much appreciated.
Thank you
